name: Dark Side of the Raccoon
description:
Kill the enemies on the dark side of the planet raccoon! Move using the A and S keys to move to the left and right and jump with W. Use your sword with the E key. Pick up powerups to make regen your health, make the time go slower and even make time go backwards. And if you die, you can always restart using the ESC key.

Game made by@wokeraccoon. Music by Smathrar. Sound effects from freesound.org.
